positive.review: the money sucking game. Great to make yourself broke, good times, good times

Obviously players that spend real money in game have an advantage. 
Yet no cash players still enjoy the game.

"Lords Mobile: Kingdom Wars" — динамичный стратегический битва, где игроки могут создавать крепости и сражаться за власть. Геймплей сложен, но увлекательен благодаря разнообразию фракций, стратегическим решениям и многопользовательскому режиму. Однако некоторые механики требуют времени на освоение, а выбор героев может быть ограничен. Игра сочетает в себе глубину и скорость, что делает её привлекательной для поклонников стратегий. Рекомендуется для тех, кто готов к тяжёлому обучению и радуясь каждому сражению.
Nice game!
A game where you can spend 1k and still get jumped by 20 castles who spent enough for a mid ranged car or house payment!

THE DEVELOPERS ARE BAITING YOU TO SPEND ON SMALL PURCHASES. THEY ARE ONLY GOOD FOR THE FIRST 1-2 MONTHS.
THIS GAME IS GARBAGE PAY-TO-WIN
DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY.
SMALL ONE TIME PURCHASES ARE NOT ENOUGH. YOU'RE THROWING MONEY AWAY BY SMALL 1-10 USD PURCHASES.
THIS WILL GET YOU NO WHERE COMPARED TO WHALES SPENDING HILARIOUS AMOUNTS OF MONEY JUST TO GET AHEAD IN THIS GAME.
THIS IS A GARBAGE GAME AND DOES NOT BELONG ON STEAM. DRIVE OUT THIS FILTH BACK TO ANDROID HELL.

"Lords Mobile: Kingdom Wars" — динамичный стратегический битва, где игроки могут создавать крепости и сражаться за власть. Геймплей сложен, но увлекательен благодаря разнообразию фракций, стратегическим решениям и многопользовательскому режиму. Однако некоторые механики требуют времени на освоение, а выбор героев может быть ограничен. Игра сочетает в себе глубину и скорость, что делает её привлекательной для поклонников стратегий. Рекомендуется для тех, кто готов к тяжёлому обучению и радуясь каждому сражению.

Oh boy where to start... Ive played this game for years on my phone, wasted a lot of money and time.. did i enjoy? hell yea!, i do not regret any of it, it is a fun game to play, you can play for years, you meet great people, have fun activities to do and you get a lot of items for free... that being said, i do think its more of a rich people game, but if you have enough time and patience, you also can get everything in game !

Хорошая мобильная стратегия с большим количеством возможностей для развития королевства и взаимодействия с другими игроками. Мне нравится необходимость планировать и принимать решения, чтобы преуспеть. Хотя и требуются вложения времени, можно весело провести время, соревнуясь с друзьями.
Gathered warriors and beat the barbarians. Victory
be ready to spend big bucks

all u do i spend money to win
1 hour toutorial i kill my family cause i rage quit i will sue u all igg gays

[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loot_box][b]Warning: Loot Box Gambling[/b][/url]

This game uses random-chance loot boxes as a form of gambling and exploits psychological vulnerabilities. This is done for the profit of the developers, regardless of the harm it causes to gamers. This is completely predatory and unethical. Gamers must be aware of the dangers of this predatory monetization and should avoid this completely.[/quote]

[quote][b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microtransaction]Warning: Microtransaction infested mobile app![/url][/b]

This game is infested with a toxic mobile app style cash shop.  You will be prompted to and expected to give money to the developers through this cash shop to buy in-game goods so you can play the game.[/quote]

"Lords Mobile: Kingdom Wars" is one of thousands of nasty mobile apps infesting the "free" section of Steam, but it's not really free.

This mobile app cancer is a highly successful (on app stores) ripoff of Clash of Clans... it looks like a real strategy game, but it's not, the winner is determined by who spends the most money on loot boxes.  This is cancer.

There's only a superficial game here.   The game visuals and the game itself are incredibly shallow... think of them as the too-bright, colourful, thin plastic cabinet dress theme on a poker machine at the casino. That's basically what this is.  So really, the mobile app "game" is just a veneer, a thin skin wrapped around a nasty, predatory mobile app cash shop.

Putting that toxic mobile app monetisation aside... this is a mobile app.  I didn't spend thousands on a gaming PC so I could pretend it's an iPhone, and I don't think you did either... this kind of mobile app has no place in your Steam library.

As with all mobile scams, you're forced to sign a highly questionable yet legally unenforceable End User License Agreement... for such a relatively low effort, low quality mobile app, this is specifically designed to invalidate your consumer rights and destroy your right to privacy.  This agreement includes questionable requirements that may attempt to revoke consumer law protections that gamers expect to have, which is also highly problematic.  Developers must learn they are here to serve gamers, not control them.  I had my cat walk over the keyboard while the EULA was displaying, which fixed that problem for me.

This game is fairly dated at 6 years old... and even back then it looked old and busted compared to contemporary, professionally made 3D games of the same period.  It looked bad then, it looks worse now.

Now on to pricing and value for gamers.

Given that this free title won't increase your game collector count, is it worth your time to add it to your library?

Definitely not.  This isn't worth it.  I'm paraphrasing another reviewer here, but this should be a paid product... they'd have to pay people to download it.

Played this game for 5-6 years. The developers are super greedy, the game is completely Pay to Win and it's almost impossible to even survive if you don't spend money on the game. I strongly suggest to avoid this as even if you start spending the upcoming updates just become more expensive and expensive, it's a neverending cycle of wasting money
this game was peak until it got so p2w that now its unplayble... there will always be someone better than you no matter how much you grind.
insainly expensive and unbalanced game
probably the most expensive game to play in the world. Not even really that fun.
started on the mobile version. this game is simply this. whoever pays more wins.

im a long time player about 8 years i got 3116 consecutive logins under my belt. this is completely pay to win. before it was withstandable due to events providing some chests and materials that were only able to be received from buying. now they removed getting those chest as rewards. events that you could run to for a to try to get a new castle skin barley pays out to get anything other than speed ups. they use have it in there shop where they say an item cost 4.99 is 75% off which is highly illegal in multiple counties pretty sure they got in trouble cause now it says about 2000%+ some says value some says nothing. im a free to play player i will never drop money on this game but they are actively putting in more stuff to make it where you will have to drop money just to stay compeditive or to grow.

game is good, but you cant survive without spending money
3/10

all u do i spend money to win
1 hour toutorial i kill my family cause i rage quit i will sue u all igg gays

[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loot_box][b]Warning: Loot Box Gambling[/b][/url]

This game uses random-chance loot boxes as a form of gambling and exploits psychological vulnerabilities. This is done for the profit of the developers, regardless of the harm it causes to gamers. This is completely predatory and unethical. Gamers must be aware of the dangers of this predatory monetization and should avoid this completely.[/quote]

[quote][b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microtransaction]Warning: Microtransaction infested mobile app![/url][/b]

This game is infested with a toxic mobile app style cash shop.  You will be prompted to and expected to give money to the developers through this cash shop to buy in-game goods so you can play the game.[/quote]

"Lords Mobile: Kingdom Wars" is one of thousands of nasty mobile apps infesting the "free" section of Steam, but it's not really free.

This mobile app cancer is a highly successful (on app stores) ripoff of Clash of Clans... it looks like a real strategy game, but it's not, the winner is determined by who spends the most money on loot boxes.  This is cancer.

There's only a superficial game here.   The game visuals and the game itself are incredibly shallow... think of them as the too-bright, colourful, thin plastic cabinet dress theme on a poker machine at the casino. That's basically what this is.  So really, the mobile app "game" is just a veneer, a thin skin wrapped around a nasty, predatory mobile app cash shop.

Putting that toxic mobile app monetisation aside... this is a mobile app.  I didn't spend thousands on a gaming PC so I could pretend it's an iPhone, and I don't think you did either... this kind of mobile app has no place in your Steam library.

As with all mobile scams, you're forced to sign a highly questionable yet legally unenforceable End User License Agreement... for such a relatively low effort, low quality mobile app, this is specifically designed to invalidate your consumer rights and destroy your right to privacy.  This agreement includes questionable requirements that may attempt to revoke consumer law protections that gamers expect to have, which is also highly problematic.  Developers must learn they are here to serve gamers, not control them.  I had my cat walk over the keyboard while the EULA was displaying, which fixed that problem for me.

This game is fairly dated at 6 years old... and even back then it looked old and busted compared to contemporary, professionally made 3D games of the same period.  It looked bad then, it looks worse now.

Now on to pricing and value for gamers.

Given that this free title won't increase your game collector count, is it worth your time to add it to your library?

Definitely not.  This isn't worth it.  I'm paraphrasing another reviewer here, but this should be a paid product... they'd have to pay people to download it.

Played this game for 5-6 years. The developers are super greedy, the game is completely Pay to Win and it's almost impossible to even survive if you don't spend money on the game. I strongly suggest to avoid this as even if you start spending the upcoming updates just become more expensive and expensive, it's a neverending cycle of wasting money
this game was peak until it got so p2w that now its unplayble... there will always be someone better than you no matter how much you grind.
insainly expensive and unbalanced game
probably the most expensive game to play in the world. Not even really that fun.
started on the mobile version. this game is simply this. whoever pays more wins.

im a long time player about 8 years i got 3116 consecutive logins under my belt. this is completely pay to win. before it was withstandable due to events providing some chests and materials that were only able to be received from buying. now they removed getting those chest as rewards. events that you could run to for a to try to get a new castle skin barley pays out to get anything other than speed ups. they use have it in there shop where they say an item cost 4.99 is 75% off which is highly illegal in multiple counties pretty sure they got in trouble cause now it says about 2000%+ some says value some says nothing. im a free to play player i will never drop money on this game but they are actively putting in more stuff to make it where you will have to drop money just to stay compeditive or to grow.

game is good, but you cant survive without spending money
3/10
you need a bank to have a chance to win anything if you don't plan pay at less than 1k a month than no
